title: Halve your fuel expense? Bajaj's CNG bike may do just that
description: Bajaj Auto plans to disrupt the entry-level motorcycle market with the world's first CNG-run motorcycle, aiming to halve monthly fuel expenses. The bi-fuel motorcycles, priced at a premium, will challenge Hero MotoCorp's dominance. Bajaj aims to capitalize on the mileage-conscious entry-level segment, where it currently holds an 8% share. The move aligns with government carbon reduction goals and leverages Bajaj's experience in CNG three-wheelers. Launching first in Maharashtra and Gujarat, Bajaj plans to expand its CNG motorcycle portfolio in India and select international markets.
